name: Boxy's Quest Demo
description:
Boxy's Quest is a Puzzle shooter game!

This release is only a Demo version of the game because i'm the only one making
it and thanks for my friends that help me sketch the maps.

The game is not really fully fixed so you may encounter some bugs or glitches, notify me in the comment section to fix it, also the full might release in late summer of 2020 because i'm the only one making it. you may donate me to upgrade my unity and my computer to fasten the release of the full version. You can help me by sending me some maps that might be in the game soon! a positive review is appreciated makes me motivated while making it. 

To make the game not boring i added a console in it so you can have fun in the game!
